content: @rkruppe which ABI is the one for riscv nowadays?

the "unix C ABI" is documented at https://github.com/riscv/riscv-elf-psabi-doc/blob/master/riscv-elf.md which llvm and gcc implement but idk what rustc does if that's what you mean. there's a lot of talk about other ABIs (faster interrupts, vector calls, rv32e with its 16 gprs, etc.) but none of them are really as defined yet afaik
Iâ€™m gonna use extern "C" and write some assembly
so was wondering what I should target
